data.name: ErrorFailedToConvert
data.value: Failed to convert the value indicated to a number.

data.name: SelectNext
data.value: Select the next value to search for.

data.name: ErrorValueNotSetFormatString
data.value: The error {0} occurred. Value not set.

data.name: ErrorProcessOpenFailed
data.value: The process selected failed to be opened for modifying.

data.name: ErrorProcessUnmodifiable
data.value: This process cannot be modified. Sorry!

data.name: ErrorProcessThisOne
data.value: The process you selected is this one. What are you thinking?

data.name: ErrorProcessSelect
data.value: Please select a process before selecting to hack.

data.name: ToolTip_ProcessList
data.value: This is the list of processes currently available in the system. Select a process to search and alter it's memory.

data.name: ToolTip_FriendlyNames
data.value: This is the list of either window names or service names running under the selected process.

data.name: ToolTip_SelectProcess
data.value: Selects the process to be modified. It will be disabled if the process is not modifiable.

data.name: ToolTip_ApplicationPath
data.value: This is the path to the application that started this process.

data.name: ToolTip_MemHackDlg
data.value: MemHack is a tool to alter the memory of a running applications.

data.name: ToolTip_AddressList
data.value: This lists the addresses found to contain the value searched for. Use Find Next to reduce the size of the list.

data.name: ToolTip_FindFirst
data.value: Select the memory size and value for the first value to search for.

data.name: ToolTip_FindNext
data.value: Searches within the list of already found addresses for the next value.

data.name: ToolTip_Set
data.value: Sets the value at the given address to a new value.

data.name: ToolTip_Messages
data.value: Current status. Errors, number of found addresses, and other messages appear here.

data.name: ToolTip_MemDisplayDlg
data.value: Search for a specific value in memory using Find First and Find Next and then use Set to change the selected value.

data.name: ToolTip_FindFirst1Byte
data.value: Searches each byte for the specified value.

data.name: ToolTip_FindFirst2Bytes
data.value: Searches each byte pair for the specified value.

data.name: ToolTip_FindFirst4Bytes
data.value: Searches each byte quad for the specified value.

data.name: ToolTip_FindFirst8Bytes
data.value: Searches each 8 byte memory region for the specified value.

data.name: ToolTip_FindFirstValue
data.value: Indicate the value to search for as a decimal or hexadecimal value.

data.name: ToolTip_FindFirstDlg
data.value: Select the memory size and value for the first value to search for.

data.name: ToolTip_FindNextDlg
data.value: Searches within the list of already found addresses for the next value. Change the value in the application to make this search more efficient.

data.name: ToolTip_FindNextValue
data.value: Indicate the value to search for as a decimal or hexadecimal value.

data.name: ToolTip_FindNextButton
data.value: Begin searching within the list of addresses already found. May take a while.

data.name: ToolTip_SetDlg
data.value: Sets the value at the given address to a new value.

data.name: ToolTip_SetValue
data.value: Indicate the value to set as a decimal or hexadecimal value.

data.name: ToolTip_SetButton
data.value: Set the value at the selected address.
